title: FOV?
body:
I don't know if I'm crazy or if I'm just not paying attention, but it seems that it's harder for me to use unlocked camera and leave it in one position when I'm laning is because the amount I can see is smaller then what I see most streamers have.
I have a 1360x768 monitor, so I have no clue if there's something I can change or..

help?

replies.body:
To be honest, I am not entirely sure what you are asking or what you mean.  Are you asking if you can increase your field of vision when using locked camera?

Reply back and let me know!
